prompt: Subject: Chinese couple (the man and Eleven). Context: Rooftop at twilight overlooking the city. Action: The man gently tucks a strand of hair behind Eleven's ear; they share a deep, knowing look. Style: Warm, romantic, cinematic with soft-focus, dreamlike visuals. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow dolly in from medium two-shot to close-up, eye level. Composition: Medium two-shot (couple sitting) transitioning to close-up of their faces. Ambiance: Golden hour twilight lighting, warm golden tones, soft, slightly desaturated yet rich color palette.
